title: $875/1 bedroom available
posting_body: ['A Beautiful Sunshine bedroom on the SECOND - story available AUGUST 1 or AUGUST 15/22  in the Dorchester / South Bay area Boston.', 'Respectful,  quiet  applicant to fit with 2 other girls.', '2- Story apartment.', 'TWO off- street parking places.', 'Laundry in-unit.', 'The first- story has the 2 bedrooms and 1 office room, kitchen, living room, 1 Full bathroom.', 'The SECOND -  story is a LARGE bedroom  (plus office) with 1 Full bathroom privacy.', ' The landlord live downstairs , friendly and quick to respond to any request.', ' Eat-in kitchen with dishwasher, disposal, and gas stove.', ' Washer and dryer in unit.', ' Re-new floors and Re-new bathrooms.', 'Rent $875 plus Utilities ( Gas, Internet, Electricity) are separate bills worked out among roommates.', 'First and Security deposit due at start.', 'Rent is month-to-month lease or lease/year.', '- Across the street from the trendy 224 Boston st. Restaurant & Tavern.', '- The growing South Bay Center outdoor mall is just right behind the house with 5 minute walk away ( Stop & Shop, Panera Bread, Chipotle, Starbucks, Best Buy, Target,  TJ Maxx, AMC Theaters, Target...)', '- 10 minute walk to Andrew station (Red line).', 'Bus 8,16, 17,10, CT 2 nearby...', '- Short walk to Carson beach, Castle Island in South Boston.', '- Quick bus ride to Boston Medical center, BU Medical Campus, UMass Boston.', 'Available AUGUST 1 or AUGUST 15/22.', 'No smokers.', 'No pets.', 'No couple please.', 'If interested, please Text with some information about yourself and we can set up a time to meet.', 'Thanks!']
